thread.title: Jeremy McConnell is having the "best birthday ever" as he celebrates becoming a father
thread.title_full: Jeremy McConnell is having the "best birthday ever" as he celebrates becoming a father - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Jeremy McConnell is having the "best birthday ever" as he celebrates becoming a father
text:
Jeremy McConnell is having the "best birthday ever" as he celebrates becoming a father The reality star turns 27 today   Share   Comments By Vicki Newman 09:02, 22 FEB 2017 Celebs Is Caben the reason Jeremy's having the best birthday ever?     celebs   Jeremy McConnell seems to have a lot to celebrate today. 
The Irish hunk took to Twitter to say that he's having the best birthday ever.
Is that because he's become a father for the first time?
The former Celebrity Big Brother star turned 27 today and took to Twitter to express his joy. 
"Woken up to the best birthday Iv ever had," he shared, alongside a string of rosy-cheeked smiling emojis.
The proud dad was recently spotted out with his ex Stephanie Davis , who gave birth to their son Caben-Albi George Davis on January 13. 
Read More Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell 'could be the next Katie Price and Peter Andre' with their own TV show Jeremy turns 27 today (Photo: Stephanie Davis / Twitter) The pair seem to be back on good terms now after a year-long battle.
They first met on CBB last year and continued dating on the outside world. 
Stephanie found out she was pregnant shortly after they split and at first, Jez said she was lying.
But when it became clear the former Hollyoaks star was expecting, he denied he was the dad and said he wanted a paternity test.
Read More Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell look 'totally smitten' as first snaps with baby Caben suggest possible reconciliation Is Caben the reason Jeremy is having the best birthday ever? The estranged McQueen makes his ret 0:33 Phillip Schofield blasts 'selfish' woman who thin 0:36 Stephanie Davis shares old video of her late gran 0:45 Stephanie Davis posts hilarious funny face video 0:30 Are Stephanie Davis and Jeremy McConnell on holid 0:31 Phillip Schofield lays into Stephanie and Jeremy' 0:57 Stephanie Davis goes BLONDE ahead of big night ou 0:50 Jeremy McConnell and Stephanie Davis toast their 0:12 Jeremy admits he and Stephanie are working toward 0:28 "I have fallen in love on TV": Jeremy admits that 2:08 Video will play in  Jeremy McConnell says the love was real with Stephanie in the beginning Share this video Watch Next Jez went on to appear on This Morning to have a DNA test live on air, and shortly afterwards told the world that Caben is his son.
One week ago, he shared a picture of the bonny boy on Instagram, writing: "Happiest man alive , my new focus".
Mirror Celeb has contacted Jeremy's representatives for comment.
